page.title: 13Who Works Where
page.content: Cookridge is not a working place but a dormitory for Leeds. It has grown to be as large as it is because it is only 5 miles from the centre of Leeds where thousands of people work. This discovery was the result of a survey covering all the parents of the older children in our school. {Location :Junior 2 : Junior 1 : Totals { Dads Mums Dads Mums } Cookridge 8 22 11 17 19 39 Leeds 51 26 57 19 108 45 Yorkshire 25 8 20 4 45 12 England 10 0 8 0 18 0 {Totals 94 56 96 40 190 96 We found that most fathers work in other parts of Leeds and those who work outside Yorkshire usually had their main office in Leeds. Most mothers only work part time and as near as possible to Cookridge.
